Name: Cucumber (PH)
SeedDescription: Plant these in the summer. Takes 8 days to mature and continues to produce after first harvest. Grows on a leaning wooden support.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plant these in the summer. Takes 8 days to mature and continues to produce after first harvest. Grows on a leaning wooden support.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ko: Plant these in the summer. Takes 8 days to mature and continues to produce after first harvest. Grows on a leaning wooden support.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Pflanze sie im Sommer. Wächst in 8 Tagen heran, kann aber danach mehrmals geerntet werden. Wächst an einem Rankgerüst.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.fr: Plant these in the summer. Takes 8 days to mature and continues to produce after first harvest. Grows on a leaning wooden support.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.hu: Plant these in the summer. Takes 8 days to mature and continues to produce after first harvest. Grows on a leaning wooden support.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.it: Plant these in the summer. Takes 8 days to mature and continues to produce after first harvest. Grows on a leaning wooden support.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ja: Plant these in the summer. Takes 8 days to mature and continues to produce after first harvest. Grows on a leaning wooden support.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plant these in the summer. Takes 8 days to mature and continues to produce after first harvest. Grows on a leaning wooden support.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ru: Сажать летом. Вырастают через 8 дней, но затем продолжают плодоносить. Растут на покосившейся деревянной опоре.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.tr: Plant these in the summer. Takes 8 days to mature and continues to produce after first harvest. Grows on a leaning wooden support.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 夏天种植。 需要8天成熟。第一次收获后继续结果。 生长在一个倾斜的木架上。
